title: Label release liners containing PCR content and unbleached fibres revealed by Ahlstrom - Packaging Europe
summary: Ahlstrom introduces new high-performance release liners with recycled and unbleached fiber content for Pressure Sensitive Adhesive laminates and labels, aiming to decrease waste and increase product safety. The Acti-V technology used in these products enables potential reductions in energy, catalyst, and silicone consumption through efficient coating and converting processes.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is a green innovation as it involves introducing new products with recycled and unbleached fiber content to reduce environmental impact and promote sustainability.
business_innovation: TRUE. This is a business innovation as Ahlstrom is extending its product line with new high-performance release liners, a significant departure from its previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE. The new release liners by Ahlstrom, designed to significantly reduce environmental impact throughout their life cycle, qualify as green products due to their use of recycled and unbleached fiber content.
green_process: TRUE. The manufacturing process involving the production of these high-performance release liners with recycled and unbleached fiber content aligns with green processes by minimizing environmental impacts and promoting sustainability.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 322220 - Paper Bag and Coated and Treated Paper Manufacturing, 322230 - Stationery Product Manufacturing, 322291 - Sanitary Paper Product Manufacturing, 322299 - All Other Converted Paper Product Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. This does not seem to be an example of greenwashing as the article highlights concrete efforts by Ahlstrom to introduce environmentally friendly products with recycled content.
